description: This spatula is like a magic wand – flip your food with it and it’ll taste like Julia Child’s beef bourguignon or Jamie Oliver’s macaroni cheese. (Lots of red wine and wild imagination sold separately).Pivoting design lets you enjoy cooking with a full-size tool, without having to pack one.Reinforced handle pivots for extra durability.Made with high temperature nylon 66.Serrated cutting edge makes quick portioning.
name: GSI Pivot Spatula
